1#include "widget.h"
2#include "widget_elements/widget_element_i.h"
3#include <furi.h>
4#include <m-array.h>
5
6ARRAY_DEF(ElementArray, WidgetElement*, M_PTR_OPLIST);
7
8struct Widget {
9 View* view;
10 void* context;
11};
12
13typedef struct {
14 ElementArray_t element;
15} GuiWidgetModel;
16
17static void gui_widget_view_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* _model) {
18 GuiWidgetModel* model = _model;
19 canvas_clear(canvas);
20
21 // Draw all elements
22 ElementArray_it_t it;
23 ElementArray_it(it, model->element);
24 while(!ElementArray_end_p(it)) {
25 WidgetElement* element = *ElementArray_ref(it);
26 if(element->draw != NULL) {
27 element->draw(canvas, element);
28 }
29 ElementArray_next(it);
30 }
31}
32
33static bool gui_widget_view_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context) {
34 Widget* widget = context;
35 bool consumed = false;
36
37 // Call all Widget Elements input handlers
38 with_view_model(
39 widget->view,
40 GuiWidgetModel * model,
41 {
42 ElementArray_it_t it;
43 ElementArray_it(it, model->element);
44 while(!ElementArray_end_p(it)) {
45 WidgetElement* element = *ElementArray_ref(it);
46 if(element->input != NULL) {
47 consumed |= element->input(event, element);
48 }
49 ElementArray_next(it);
50 }
51 },
52 true);
53
54 return consumed;
55}
56
57Widget* widget_alloc() {
58 Widget* widget = malloc(sizeof(Widget));
59 widget->view = view_alloc();
60 view_set_context(widget->view, widget);
61 view_allocate_model(widget->view, ViewModelTypeLocking, sizeof(GuiWidgetModel));
62 view_set_draw_callback(widget->view, gui_widget_view_draw_callback);
63 view_set_input_callback(widget->view, gui_widget_view_input_callback);
64
65 with_view_model(
66 widget->view, GuiWidgetModel * model, { ElementArray_init(model->element); }, true);
67
68 return widget;
69}
70
71void widget_reset(Widget* widget) {
72 furi_assert(widget);
73
74 with_view_model(
75 widget->view,
76 GuiWidgetModel * model,
77 {
78 ElementArray_it_t it;
79 ElementArray_it(it, model->element);
80 while(!ElementArray_end_p(it)) {
81 WidgetElement* element = *ElementArray_ref(it);
82 furi_assert(element->free);
83 element->free(element);
84 ElementArray_next(it);
85 }
86 ElementArray_reset(model->element);
87 },
88 true);
89}
90
91void widget_free(Widget* widget) {
92 furi_assert(widget);
93 // Free all elements
94 widget_reset(widget);
95 // Free elements container
96 with_view_model(
97 widget->view, GuiWidgetModel * model, { ElementArray_clear(model->element); }, true);
98
99 view_free(widget->view);
100 free(widget);
101}
102
103View* widget_get_view(Widget* widget) {
104 furi_assert(widget);
105 return widget->view;
106}
107
108static void widget_add_element(Widget* widget, WidgetElement* element) {
109 furi_assert(widget);
110 furi_assert(element);
111
112 with_view_model(
113 widget->view,
114 GuiWidgetModel * model,
115 {
116 element->parent = widget;
117 ElementArray_push_back(model->element, element);
118 },
119 true);
120}
121
122WidgetElement* widget_add_string_multiline_element(
123 Widget* widget,
124 uint8_t x,
125 uint8_t y,
126 Align horizontal,
127 Align vertical,
128 Font font,
129 const char* text) {
130 furi_assert(widget);
131 WidgetElement* string_multiline_element =
132 widget_element_string_multiline_create(x, y, horizontal, vertical, font, text);
133 widget_add_element(widget, string_multiline_element);
134 return string_multiline_element;
135}
